page.description: Enables or disables NULL selection (i.e. no value) for a ViewBox.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Allow NULL selection]* controls whether or not the ViewBox with selectable elements can have "no selection". If unchecked, the first element is automatically selected when the ViewBox is rendered.
Checking this property also exposes the [Allow de-select] property.
